scan_linter_check.description: Debug output should be used to do exactly that: to debug. Once debugging is completed, any output or logging intended for debugging purposes should be removed - including code that is commented out.
scan_linter_check.name: CodeSanity - Debug output
scan_linter_check.resolution_details: Remove any traits of debug output and logging from code.
scan_linter_check.short_description: Checks if debug output is present in code.

sys_update_version.name: scan_linter_check_78b4ce9ddbbf0554bcced03cd3961959
